name: Shapo
description:
Get ready to test your skills of speed, balance, and strategy in this unique puzzler. Catch clusters of marbles and quickly place them on the teeter-totter grid. This seemingly simple task is complicated by an increasing number of heavier and heavier marble types.
Shapo offers two exciting game modes: Puzzle and Classic.
Classic Mode starts with a simple concept: complete a single puzzle and advance. As you do so, the puzzles become increasingly more challenging. This is the "quick in" / "quick out" game mode, guaranteed to deliver fast action fun while you're on the go.
Puzzle Mode takes you on a journey around the world as you unlock interesting facts about exciting locations and most important, more puzzles! This immersive game mode will provide hours of non-stop action.
